inclusion.criterion: Healthy singleton term born infants of appropriate size for gestational age (AGA)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: according to the Centers for Disease Control growth charts based on weight at birth

inclusion.criterion: between the 5th and 95th percentiles for sex
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: according to the Centers for Disease Control growth charts based on weight at birth

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: This allows us to assess growth and bone mineral accretion without bias of intrauterine growth restriction

exclusion.criterion: Infants of mothers with history of gestational diabetes or hypertension in pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: malabsorption syndromes due to malabsorption of vitamin D (celiac disease, Crohn's etc.)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone, confirmed by increased uptake of radioactive substance and urinary pyridinoline. His sister had the same problems.
